name: Stickman's Mission Impossible (Demo)
description:
This is a very early demo of a game (idea) I am making. The feedback that I get from you will help shape this game.

There are 2 "levels" in the game. First is a classic style platformer and the second is a 3D world. The current goal is to determine which style of game play to take after which the storey will be written and game development will begin.

Feel free to post your opinions on the game.
